text:
With the use of Gen
AI, we're really trying

to enhance the developer
experience at NAB,

so we really wanted to
take the opportunity to

investigate what Amazon
Q could provide in terms

of improving the dev
experience for our developers.

The Amazon Q development
tools are benefiting our

colleagues and devs really
by enabling our devs
to write their functions faster,

to write their unit tests
faster, enabling them
to secure their code in an improved way,

enhancing their documentation,
assisting them with some
of the solutions they write

and also making more effective
use of the frameworks

that we've provided them
through customizations.
Q Developer is helping us embrace transformation
with Code Transform.
Helping us move some of our legacy,
monolithic code to upgraded modern code,

which will then improve the
experience for our customers

as these features get released
and we've made those upgrades.
From there we've scaled to 1,000 users

using Q Developer, and
we have plans to further

extend that to around 2,800
to 3,000 devs this year.

87% of our devs say they would
recommend using Q Developer
to one of their colleagues.

41% said it's helping
them be more efficient in
in the work that they're doing.

And 45% of the devs said it's
really improving the quality

of the code that they're
putting into production,

which at the end of the day
is used by our customers,
so really important that
that code quality is also being uplifted.
AWS's customer obsession has inspired

and NAB to think differently
about how we really want
to provide service to our customers.
